first_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
second_translate: Right before I was swallowed by the darkness,

first_translate: even if it was just for a moment,
second_translate: Even if it was just for a moment,

first_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from coming closer.
second_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from approaching.

first_translate: does that mean...
second_translate: Am I perhaps...

first_translate: ...I can control the darkness?
second_translate: Could I be able to control the darkness?

first_translate: then that brings up another question.
second_translate: Then another question arises.

hangle: 원작의 피오나는 어둠을 통제할 수 없었다.
first_translate: the original fiona couldn’t control the darkness.
second_translate: The original Fiona couldn't control the darkness.

first_translate: so why was I able to do it?
second_translate: But why was I able to succeed?

first_translate: we have the same body and the same talent.
second_translate: Same body, same talent.

first_translate: I guess I won’t be able to find the answer to this either.
second_translate: There's no point in worrying about this either~

first_translate: this is giving me a headache.
second_translate: My head hurts, my head.

first_translate: ah, I’m so full!
second_translate: Ah~ I'm full!

first_translate: marquess relton must have been really grateful.
second_translate: Marquess Relton must have been extremely grateful.

first_translate: I can’t believe he served us so many delicious dishes.
second_translate: I can't believe he served so many delicious dishes.

first_translate: yeah...
second_translate: ...Yeah.

first_translate: hm...
second_translate: Hm~

first_translate: is something wrong?
second_translate: Are you feeling unwell?

first_translate: he didn’t eat much earlier either.
second_translate: You didn't eat much before either.

first_translate: I’m glad I came with the envoy this time.
second_translate: I'm glad I joined the envoy this time.

first_translate: why?
second_translate: ...Why?

first_translate: we gained a lot from this trip.
second_translate: We gained something.

first_translate: the people at the academy were better than I thought.
second_translate: The people at the academy were actually better than I expected.

hangle: 그 사람들, 목숨 빚을 졌다고 생각하고 있으니까…
first_translate: they feel indebted for their lives,
second_translate: They feel indebted for their lives...

hangle: 나중에 분명 호의적인 태도를 보일 거야.
first_translate: so I’m sure they’ll be friendly toward us later.
second_translate: I'm sure they'll show a favorable attitude later.

first_translate: on top of that,
second_translate: Besides,

first_translate: I realized I’m a greater person than I thought.
second_translate: I realized that I was more amazing than I thought.

first_translate: I was able to control the darkness...
second_translate: Darkness.

first_translate: ...even though it was hard.
second_translate: Even though it was difficult, I definitely controlled it.

hangle: 분명 어둠 토벌에 엄청난 도움이 될 거야.
first_translate: I’m sure it’ll be a huge help in defeating the darkness.
second_translate: I'm sure it will be a tremendous help in subjugating the darkness.

first_translate: are you planning to get involved with the darkness again?
second_translate: Are you thinking of getting involved with the darkness again?

first_translate: of course!
second_translate: Of course!

first_translate: fiona.
second_translate: Fiona.

first_translate: fiona!
second_translate: fiona!

first_translate: ...and his body was as cold as ice.
second_translate: ...and that body was as cold as ice.

first_translate: it felt like the world was collapsing.
second_translate: It felt like the world was collapsing.

first_translate: you don’t need to help.
second_translate: There's no need to help.

first_translate: I didn’t expect him to be happy,
second_translate: Even if he wasn’t happy,

first_translate: but I thought he’d at least congratulate me.
second_translate: I thought there would at least be some congratulations.

first_translate: why...?
second_translate: ...Why?

first_translate: don’t ever...
second_translate: Don't ever do something like that again.

first_translate: ...do what you did last time again.
second_translate: Don't ever do it again.

first_translate: it’s reckless and absurd.
second_translate: It's absurd and reckless.

first_translate: still, what I did was right.
second_translate: Still, what I did was the right thing to do.

first_translate: I know.
second_translate: I know.

first_translate: there’s plenty of room for reflection.
second_translate: There’s plenty of room for remorse.

first_translate: I was the person in charge there.
second_translate: I was the one responsible there.

first_translate: it was the best I could do.
second_translate: That was the best option.

first_translate: you’re right, actually.
second_translate: Yeah, actually, you were right.

first_translate: you’re a great asset.
second_translate: You're a major force.

hangle: 가끔은 생존을 우선시해야 할 때가 있어.
first_translate: there are times when you need to prioritize your own survival.
second_translate: Sometimes, survival has to come first.

hangle: 그리고 어둠에 대한 정보는 너한테도 도움이 되잖아.
first_translate: and the information about the darkness will be helpful to you too.
second_translate: And the information about the darkness will be useful to you as well.

first_translate: that’s why I fought.
second_translate: That’s the mindset I fought with.

first_translate: but...
second_translate: But...

first_translate: I’m telling you...
second_translate: So,

first_translate: ...I don’t need that kind of help...!
second_translate: I said I don’t need that kind of help…!

hangle: 억지를 써서라도 너를 잃고 싶지 않아…
first_translate: I don’t want to lose you, even if I have to be stubborn about it...
second_translate: I don’t want to lose you, even if I have to force it...

first_translate: siegren...
second_translate: ...Siegren.

first_translate: if you’re annoyed, don’t be sarcastic.
second_translate: If you're annoyed, just get angry instead of being sarcastic!

first_translate: just get mad!
second_translate: Just get angry instead!

first_translate: you... idiot!
second_translate: Y-You... idiot!

first_translate: wait, fiona!
second_translate: Wait, Fiona!

first_translate: go away!
second_translate: Go away!

first_translate: don’t follow me!
second_translate: Don't follow me!

first_translate: that’s not what I meant...
second_translate: That's not it...

first_translate: uh... hm...
second_translate: Uh... hm...

first_translate: should I bring her some sweets...?
second_translate: …Should I bring her some sweets?

first_translate: I’ve never really tried to comfort a lady before.
second_translate: I've hardly ever tried to comfort a lady before.

first_translate: how old do you think I am?
second_translate: How old do you think I am?

first_translate: anyway, just go back to what you were doing.
second_translate: Rather than that, just go back the way you came.

first_translate: why did you follow me?
second_translate: Why did you follow me?

hangle: 네가 울면서 창고로 도망치는데 어떻게 그냥 가나.
first_translate: how could I just leave when you ran away to the storage room in tears?
second_translate: How could I just walk away when you ran off to the storage room crying?

hangle: 그런 소리를 다 할 줄 아네.
first_translate: I’m surprised you’d say something like that.
second_translate: I didn't expect you to say something like that.

first_translate: ...got into a fight with siegren.
second_translate: I got into a fight with Siegren.

first_translate: it must be because of the darkness.
second_translate: It must be because of something related to the darkness.

hangle: 맞아. 내 행동은 충분히 옳았다고 생각하는데.
first_translate: yeah. I think what I did was right,
second_translate: Yeah. I believe my actions were completely justified.

hangle: 시그렌이 괜히 말을 밉게 하는 거야.
first_translate: but siegren said something mean for no reason.
second_translate: Siegren is just being needlessly mean.

first_translate: I know he’s just worried about me, but...
second_translate: I know he's worried about me, but...

first_translate: I should wipe away the tears...
second_translate: I should wipe away her tears...

first_translate: no,
second_translate: No,

first_translate: I shouldn’t do that...
second_translate: That wouldn't be right...

first_translate: fiona heylon,
second_translate: fiona heylon.

first_translate: you’re a good lady.
second_translate: You're a good young lady.

first_translate: you’re a bit reckless, but you’re responsible.
second_translate: You're a bit reckless, but you have a sense of responsibility.

hangle: 내 생각에도 네 판단이 객관적으로 옳았다.
first_translate: I also think your decision was objectively correct.
second_translate: I also think your judgment was objectively correct.

hangle: 그러니 시그렌이 뭐라고 했든 별로 신경 쓰지 않았으면 좋겠어.
first_translate: so I hope you don’t care about what siegren said.
second_translate: So I hope you don’t pay much attention to what Siegren said.

first_translate: it’s a shame for you to be swayed...
second_translate: To be swayed just by a boyfriend's opinion is a waste.

first_translate: ...by your boyfriend’s opinion.
second_translate: You're worth more than that.
